item.title: CVE-2024-30540|2024-08-02T01:38:59.982Z -- guido -- vs%20contact%20form
item.description: Guessable CAPTCHA vulnerability in Guido VS Contact Form allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects VS Contact Form: from n/a through 14.7.
